website_summaries.verdict: Classic sliding shower doors  with the perfect combination of looks and affordability.
pros: Comes in several glass and hardware options
Glass has a substantial feel - not flimsy
cons: Rare reports of missing pieces upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Shower Doors!!!
customer_reviews.text: Handyman didn’t seem to have any problems with the install but holy cow this was a fantastic price on a beautiful shower doors. I love the textured glass and the stylish bronze (which replaced some nasty shiny yellow brass that’s been killing me softly for the past 16 years). It made my shower look brand new. I checked similar hardware stores that rhyme with “Schmo’s” and “Dome Repo” and the cost was much, much higher
customer_reviews.author: MamaCita "Jules"

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price, good quality...our second unit I have installed in our house and would 100% recommend. I also don't write reviews but buy everything based on reviews so i felt the need to write this.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D

customer_reviews.title: Sleek! A really great value.
customer_reviews.text: We love the look and feel of this shower door. I especially like that I was able to choose the frosted glass. Overall it looks much more expensive than it is. Very modern and sleek. My husband installed it pretty quickly in a 46.5in space. (He cut it to fit.) Our only complaint is that we wish it was taller. My husband is 6’2” and has to duck quite a bit to get in the shower. Also, some water splashes out at the bottom. Still, we would purchase again and we were thankful not to have to buy a $500+ custom door.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Doors look great
customer_reviews.text: Doors look great and work great. Installation was on par with previous Delta doors but I wish the holes in the wall would have lined up with the previous ones. I might have to get some splash guards as one door doesn't quite line up with the non-square opening. The door height adjustment has only three fixed points instead of the previous ones being an angled slot to provide any amount of adjustment. One hole was too high and the other too low. The glass is sturdy and heavy with no frame and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Richey G

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shower door for the money
customer_reviews.text: Installation was fairly easy. Only thing to note is that the top rail cover is difficult to get a square cut on as it will not fit into a standard miter box. Other than that was pretty easy. The coating on the glass does a good job of keeping soap scum from building up. Don't even need to squeegee after shower. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: A great product. The first one broke before even getting ...
customer_reviews.text: A great product. The first one broke before even getting here but I think that was UPS fault. It was reordered and after receiving hte second one it setup easy and worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C. Goodpasture

customer_reviews.title: looks worth more
customer_reviews.text: Value for the money, my neighbor just paid more than double and his doesn't look as good (his words although I agree).
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Marshall

customer_reviews.title: have fun picking up the glass when it shatters in the shower
customer_reviews.text: pros nicely packaged and directions were okay hung glass and it shattered when i released my grip and it was hanging on the supports customer support was poor english and couldnt get the email address right
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. Foote

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Nice shower door, only comes with one towel bar. Easy to install. UPS lost the first order. Had to wait another 6 days
customer_reviews.author: Don H.

customer_reviews.title: new doors
customer_reviews.text: The inner door does not want to stay but one place.
customer_reviews.author: Carol K Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money,, Good instructions
customer_reviews.text: Just dont expect to install it in 1 hr. took me 4.5 hrs and there are 45 steps, and I am pretty handy with tools. Fit and finish was good. Buy a squeegee to wipe down the glass
customer_reviews.author: mark p.

customer_reviews.title: Good Shower door
customer_reviews.text: Good solid door. Very good value for the money. Looks great. Regular handyman was able to install in less than 2 hours. Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Suneetha

customer_reviews.title: Really great
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful doors. Not flimsy or cheap looking. If you have shopped for doors you know. These are from Delta too
customer_reviews.author: Joann S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy sliding door
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice heavy door. Leave a little shadow but is mostly private.
customer_reviews.author: Michael s.

customer_reviews.title: The Delta shower door was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The Delta shower door was easy to install, was a perfect fit, and now performs wonderfully. We always squeegee the shower when done so I don't know if the special coating on the inside glass really works, but so far we have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Classy for traditional shower doors
customer_reviews.text: Overall very good the 1/4 thick doors make a big difference. The doors slide back and forth real smooth.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to your cut lengths. I cut on the long side and spent a lot of time filing off the slight excess. Nice fit, once i
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made doors, not flimsy, easy installation and no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I was excited that this arrived in one piece. Was afraid of shipping glass, but it was fine. The quality was good along with a good price. Really updated or bathroom look.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy French

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Delivered before due date and in fact. Happy shopper.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Packed extremely well. Purchased for a basement bathroom remodel. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Rita S

customer_reviews.title: Green Glass
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Nebula doors which shows and describes clear glass with pattering. I received glass tinted green.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Falchi

customer_reviews.title: Finally a shower door
customer_reviews.text: Product met expectations. Should have a handle on the inside but works fine either way.
customer_reviews.author: ££££girl

customer_reviews.title: The price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Remodeling a house we loved the price and a very good quality looked really nice.
customer_reviews.author: aw

customer_reviews.title: Arrived very quickly. Just can't seem to get the ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. Just can't seem to get the doors to look straight. All in level but doors do not look right. Probably just our installation.
customer_reviews.author: Lori P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I based my purchase on good reviews. The doors are excellent with easy to follow instructions. My only issue was that it was shipped without the towel bar/knob assemblies. When I contacted Amazon, they told me that I needed to contact Delta, WRONG! After numerous tries at Delta over 2 days and numerous "That's not my area so I will transfer you to this department." Wrong again. Finally the last person told me that I had to contact Liberty, the supplier. Great news! they requested proof of purchase and the remaining parts arrived a couple of days later. Amazon and Delta not helpful. Liberty had excellent and friendly customer service. I do recommend this shower door assembly.
customer_reviews.author: JRL

customer_reviews.title: As a contractor, I would use it in my house.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a professional contractor. I put this in my in-laws master bath 3 months ago. I followed the directions. They are very pleased. They would let me know if there was a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hansen

product_meta.title: Delta Shower Doors SD3956938 Classic Semi-Frameless Traditional Sliding Shower 48"x70", Chrome Track
product_meta.description: Pattern Name:Clear| Style:Classic Handle| Color:ChromeWhether you are completing a full bathroom remodel or just looking for a great stand-alone weekend project, Delta has a shower door for you! Create your own unique shower door to fit your personal style using Delta’s 1-2-3 step customizable shower door program. Step 1: choose your glass size and style. Step 2: choose your track style and finish. Step 3: choose your handle style and finish. Delta Shower doors feature Tempered, fully frameless glass panels, rust and corrosion resistant aluminum tracks, spot guard Easy-Clean glass coating, and a 5-year limited . In addition, many of our handle and knob offerings coordinate with existing Delta bath hardware and faucet collections.
feature_bullets: Delta 1-2-3 custom shower door combines your choice of glass, track style and handle to create a personalized door; this door combination with the Traditional style track in chrome with clear frameless glass, and the Classic, simplistic handle in matte chrome offer a beautiful door at an incredible value

Frameless, 1/4” (6mm) ANSI Certified tempered safety glass treated with Spot Guard to make it easier to keep clean and resistant to water spots, soap scum and lime scale when properly maintained; clear glass is completely transparent for a more open, contemporary look

Reversible aluminum top track for two different style choices from traditional to casual with hidden rollers that smoothly glide the track; slim bottom track with center-guided door system for smooth quiet operation and side grab bumpers to hold glass panels in place

Classic sliding door handle features a simple, no frills design for the ultimate in stylish functionality that's casual and timeless; aluminum and zinc construction for durability and corrosion resistance; 20” bar perfect for extra towel storage and two knobs for more shower room
Fits doors with a minimum 43-3/8” to maximum 47-3/8” (110 cm to 120 cm) opening, with a 70” (178 cm) height, walk-in width of 15-27/32” to 19-27/32” (40 cm to 50 cm)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars75 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
